SEARCH
Package org.rdftocsvconverter.RDFtoCSVW.api.controller

Class RDFtoCSVWController

java.lang.Object
org.rdftocsvconverter.RDFtoCSVW.api.controller.RDFtoCSVWController
@RestController public class RDFtoCSVWController extends Object
The RDFtoCSVWController class that contains GET/POST methods to initiate conversions and get send results back.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RDFtoCSVWController(RDFtoCSVWService rDFtoCSVWService)
    Instantiates a new RDFtoCSVWController with endpoints and methods to get converter results.

  • Constructor Details

    • RDFtoCSVWController

      @Autowired public RDFtoCSVWController(RDFtoCSVWService rDFtoCSVWService)
      Instantiates a new RDFtoCSVWController with endpoints and methods to get converter results.
      Parameters:
      rDFtoCSVWService - the RDFtoCSVWService with methods to help the mapped endpoints to serve the conversion.

  • Method Details

    • sanityCheck

      @GetMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> sanityCheck()
      Sanity check response entity. For checking whether the service is up and running and available for other operations.
      Returns:
      the response entity returning a welcoming String

    • getCSVW

      @CrossOrigin(origins={"http://localhost:4000","https://ladymalande.github.io/"}) @PostMapping("/rdftocsvw") public byte[] getCSVW(@RequestParam(value="file",required=false) org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, @RequestParam(value="fileURL",required=false) String fileURL, @RequestParam(value="choice",required=false) ParsingChoice choice, @RequestParam(value="tables",required=false) TableChoice tables, @RequestParam(value="firstNormalForm",required=false) Boolean firstNormalForm)
      Get CSVW byte [] (.zip) format containing all converted files - CSVs and .json metadata file.
      Parameters:
      file - The RDF file to convert
      fileURL - The RDF file url to convert
      choice - The choice of parsing method
      tables - How many tables to produce - one or more
      firstNormalForm - The first normal form - whether to produce the resulting CSVs in 1NF (cells containing atomic values)
      Returns:
      byte [] Returns .zip format of all the converted parts - CSVs and .json metadata file.

    • convertRDFToCSV

      @GetMapping("/csv/string") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> convertRDFToCSV(@RequestParam("url") String url, @RequestParam(value="table",required=false) TableChoice table, @RequestParam(value="conversionMethod",required=false) ParsingChoice conversionMethod, @RequestParam(value="firstNormalForm",required=false) Boolean firstNormalForm)
      Convert rdf to csv response entity.
      Parameters:
      url - the url of RDF file for conversion
      table - the parameter for choosing how many tables to create
      conversionMethod - the conversion method choosing from RDF4J/STREAMING/BIGFILESTREAMING
      firstNormalForm - if true, the final tables will be in first normal form
      Returns:
      the Response entity

    • convertRDFToCSV

      @PostMapping("/csv/string") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> convertRDFToCSV(@RequestParam("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, @RequestParam(value="table",required=false) TableChoice table, @RequestParam(value="conversionMethod",required=false) ParsingChoice parsingMethod, @RequestParam(value="firstNormalForm",required=false) Boolean firstNormalForm)
      Convert rdf to csv string.
      Parameters:
      file - the RDF file to convert
      table - the parameter for choosing how many tables to create
      parsingMethod - the conversion method choosing from RDF4J/STREAMING/BIGFILESTREAMING
      firstNormalForm - if true, the final tables will be in first normal form
      Returns:
      the response entity returning CSV string

    • convertRDFToCSVWMetadata

      @PostMapping("/metadata/string") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> convertRDFToCSVWMetadata(@RequestParam("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, @RequestParam(value="table",required=false,defaultValue="ONE") TableChoice table, @RequestParam(value="conversionMethod",required=false) ParsingChoice parsingMethod, @RequestParam(value="firstNormalForm",required=false) Boolean firstNormalForm)
      Convert rdf to csvw metadata string.
      Parameters:
      file - the RDF file to convert
      table - the parameter for choosing how many tables to create
      parsingMethod - the conversion method choosing from RDF4J/STREAMING/BIGFILESTREAMING
      firstNormalForm - if true, the final tables will be in first normal form
